schema.title: Ambition
schema.description: A Flagrant Factions Ambition with a name, points value, and the conditions for achieving it.

name.title: Name
name.description: Specify the name of the Ambition. This is how it's referenced in play.

points.title: Victory Points
points.description: Specify how many VP the Ambition is worth if fulfilled in a Skirmish.

condition.title: Fulfillment Condition
condition.description: Specify the fullfillment conditions for the Ambition.

source.title: Source
source.description: Specify the text the Ambition belongs to, such as the name of the supplement or playkit.
